text: Selenium monochloride, also known as selenium(I) chloride or diselenium dichloride, is a chemical compound made of selenium and chlorine. Its chemical formula is . ==Properties== It is a reddish brown oily liquid. ==Preparation== It can be made by reacting selenium, selenium dioxide, and hydrochloric acid. It can be made though by just reacting chlorine with selenium. Another way to make it is reacting oleum and hydrochloric acid with selenium. ==Uses== It can be used to add selenium to other chemical compounds. ==Related pages== *Selenium(IV) chloride Category:Selenium compounds Category:Chlorides
title: Selenium monochloride
